definition: row/line/commercial firm/line of business/profession/to rank (first, second etc) among one's siblings (by age)/(in data tables) row/(Tw) column

to walk/to go/to travel/a visit/temporary/makeshift/current/in circulation/to do/to perform/capable/competent/effective/all right/OK!/will do/behavior/conduct/Taiwan pr. [xing4] for the behavior-conduct sense
to block/to be stuck/to be wedged/customs station/a clip/a fastener/a checkpost/Taiwan pr. [ka3]
to stop/to block/(computing) (coll.) slow/(loanword) card/CL:張|张[zhang1],片[pian4]/truck (from "car")/calorie (abbr. for 卡路里[ka3 lu4 li3])/cassette

sentences.english: Then she reached into her handbag and took out her ATM card.
sentences.chinese: 然後她伸手到她手提包裏拿出她的銀行卡。

sentences.english: I've lost my bankcard. Can you stop an transactions?
sentences.chinese: 我遺失了我的銀行卡，你能幫我凍結賬戶嗎？

sentences.english: These fish have a bank card the size of a palm-size but the largest.
sentences.chinese: 這些魚有銀行卡大小，最大的不過一個巴掌大。

sentences.english: The reduction of the balance on your bank account indicates the completion of the payment.
sentences.chinese: 如果成功交費，銀行卡餘額會有相應數量的減少。

sentences.english: Will you also want a bank card to withdraw your funds from a bank ATM?
sentences.chinese: 您需要一張銀行卡好讓您能在自動櫃員機領錢嗎？

sentences.english: Research on the compound decision model of the price structure and bankcard consumption.
sentences.chinese: 銀行卡網絡價格結構與刷卡消費組合決策模型研究。

sentences.english: Do you also want to take out money with a bank card?
sentences.chinese: 你想用銀行卡提領一些錢出來嗎？

sentences.english: After we got separated at the railway station, I changed bus to the main campus to deal with my bank card.
sentences.chinese: 從火車站分開後，轉到廈大本部去弄銀行卡的事。

sentences.english: For example: credit card numbers, passport details, home address.
sentences.chinese: 比如，銀行卡號，護照信息，家庭住址等等。

sentences.english: The overseas ATM and your debit card.
sentences.chinese: 考慮是否能在海外的提款機上使用你的銀行卡。

sentences.english: Monthly wage of no secret hot, the money to the bank Carry over.
sentences.chinese: 每月的工資條還沒捂熱，銀行卡里的錢就去了大半。

sentences.english: While shopping online, you can pay with your bank card.
sentences.chinese: 購物可以用銀行卡交款。

sentences.english: Never store the Keycard in the vehicle.
sentences.chinese: 請不要將銀行卡存放在車裏。

sentences.english: Do you also want to apply for a Visa or Master card?
sentences.chinese: 你想用銀行卡提領一些錢出來嗎？

sentences.english: Do you wish to order additional bankcards?
sentences.chinese: 是否想要訂購額外銀行卡？

sentences.english: Miss Zhao went to the ATM with her bank card.
sentences.chinese: 趙女士持銀行卡到銀行自助櫃員機前準備取錢。

definition: to transfer (money to a bank account)
binding (loanword)/to bind (e.g. an account to a mobile phone number)
population (counted as number of households for census or taxation)/registered residence/residence permit/(in Hong Kong and Macau) bank account
identity card/also written 身份證|身份证[shen1 fen4 zheng4]
